name: Caterpie
AbilityText: This Pokemon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

name: Metapod
AbilityText: This Pokemon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokemon if that damage is 60 or less.

name: Butterfree
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you attached Energy in this way, heal 40 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Paras
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Parasect
Attack1Text: Choose 3 of your Pokemon. For each of those Pokemon, search your deck for a different type of basic Energy card and attach it to that Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Tangela
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Pinsir
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost.

name: Ponyta
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Rapidash
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Magmar
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Cloyster

name: Magikarp
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Gyarados
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Articuno
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Pikachu

Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Raichu

name: Zapdos

name: Zubat

name: Golbat

name: Slowpoke

name: Gastly

name: Haunter
AbilityText: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may leave both Active Pokemon Confused.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. That Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Gengar
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has 3 or more damage counters on it, that Pokemon is Knocked Out.

name: Jynx
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may heal 10 damage from your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Diglett
Attack1Text: Look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her deck.

name: Dugtrio

Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Machamp

name: Geodude
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokemon.

name: Snorlax
